trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Westminster
There were 2 other sightings in Westminster on or around September 11th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked into my livingroom, raised shades to my view of the mountains, sat down to watch TV, saw a light out of the corner of my eye, looked to see this fiery canister. Never saw anything like it before! It was high over approaching dark, rain clouds coming from the west over the mountains but eventually disappeared behind them. I first chose not to report it and then decided maybe someone else saw it so made a report September 12. I was OK with the sighting, thinking I'm now one of them who has seen an UFO.
Summary: Canister, white firey, size of a penny, moving from south to west at high altitude
